meanings.definition: To observe (a day or event) with ceremonies or festivities.
meanings.sent1: Our family celebrates birthdays with cake and balloons.
meanings.sent2: The whole town celebrates the annual summer festival with music and dancing.
meanings.sent3: The school celebrates the end of the year with a talent show.
meanings.sent4: The city celebrates its history with a parade through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The community celebrates diversity with a cultural fair.

meanings.definition: To praise widely or to present to widespread and favorable public notice.
meanings.sent1: The artist celebrates the work of his students in an art exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The company celebrates its employees' achievements with an awards ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The magazine celebrates the success of a new movie star on its cover.
meanings.sent4: The organization celebrates the contributions of volunteers with a special event.
meanings.sent5: The community celebrates the heroism of local firefighters in the newspaper.
